text: Gregory Obinna Ochiagha (31 August 1931 - 29 December 2020) was a Nigerian Roman Catholic bishop. Ochiagha was born in Orlu, Nigeria. He became a priest in 1960. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Orlu, Nigeria, from 1981 until 2008. Ochiagha died on 29 December 2020 in Orlu at the age of 89.Diocese of Orlu ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Nigerian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Gregory Ochiagha
